blocks.text: Kl√¶bo, biathlon gold, and Bod√∏/Glimt's night of nights

Two Norwegian gold shots before dinner: Kl√¶bo in the team sprint free at 09:45, then Kirkeeide and Tandrevold anchor the women's biathlon relay at 14:45. Both Norway are favourites. Both are must-watch.
‚öΩ 21:00 ‚Äî Bod√∏/Glimt vs Internazionale, Champions League last-16 first leg

Historic night at Aspmyra. Bod√∏/Glimt face Inter Milan in the Champions League knockout stage ‚Äî the Norwegian side's greatest ever European fixture. After Rayo beat Atl√©tico 3-0 at the weekend, the CL field is wide open.
